cast.original_title: All Quiet on the Western Front
cast.overview: When a group of idealistic young men join the German Army during the Great War, they are assigned to the Western Front, where their patriotism is destroyed by the harsh realities of combat.
cast.title: All Quiet on the Western Front

details.biography: Poupée Andriot was born on October 29, 1899 in New York City, New York, USA. She was an actress, known for The Bait (1921). She was previously married to Lucien N. Andriot. She died on November 13, 1988 in Northridge, California, USA.
details.name: Poupée Andriot
details.place_of_birth: New York City, New York, USA
